summary: An ordinance relating to the properties, assets and liabilities of Fire Protection District No. 9; assuming all outstanding indebtedness of said District; creating a special "Seattle Fire District No. 9 Fund"; providing for payments into said Fund of all moneys accruing to the City from said District, and for payments from said Fund of all such indebtedness thereof; and for other expenditures from said Fund; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund to said Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
